snippet: During his rookie season, Detroit wide receiver Calvin Johnson was nicknamed Megatron, an evil character from the Transformers, but the moniker doesn’t quite fit his vast powers on the football field.
abstract: Detroit Lions fans and players have so far been unable to come up with new nickname that captures the diverse talents of wide receiver Calvin Johnson, who is having a spectacular season; Johnson's old nickname Megatron, evil character from Transformers movie, seems far too negative for a player with exemplary off-field conduct.
lead_paragraph: During his rookie season, Detroit wide receiver Calvin Johnson was nicknamed Megatron, an evil character from the Transformers, but the moniker doesn’t quite fit his vast powers on the football field.

headline.main: As Lions’ Star Heats Up, Few Labels Seem Accurate to Describe Him
headline.print_headline: As Lions’ Star Heats Up, Few Labels Seem Accurate to Describe Him
